title: Realme GT 2 Pro and Realme 9 launched in India alongside the Realme Buds Air 3, Realme Book Prime and Smart TV Stick
content:
In an event today, Realme unveiled a series of new products in India, including the Relme GT 2 Pro flagship and Realme 9. In addition, the company has also launched a new pair of earphones, a Windows-powered laptop, and a new TV stick. Here’s everything you need to know. Realme GT 2 Pro and Realme

The post Realme GT 2 Pro and Realme 9 launched in India alongside the Realme Buds Air 3, Realme Book Prime and Smart TV Stick appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Realme has launched the Realme GT 2 Pro and Realme 9 in India. The company has also unveiled the Realme Buds Air 3 and Realme Book Prime.
